eventsFunctionsExtensions.author: D8H
eventsFunctionsExtensions.description:
This extension allow to
* Convert coordinates
* Follow a slope
eventsFunctionsExtensions.name: Isometry
eventsFunctionsExtensions.shortDescription: Various functions and behaviors related to isometry

eventsBasedBehaviors.description: Objects passing by the slop will appear to move up or down using the `Follow` action.
eventsBasedBehaviors.name: Slope

eventsFunctions.name: Follow
eventsFunctions.sentence: _PARAM2_ follows the slope of _PARAM0_ as it moves _PARAM3_ on x axis and _PARAM4_ on y axis.

propertyDescriptors.label: Direction angle (rotation around the z axis)
propertyDescriptors.name: DirectionAngle

eventsFunctionsExtensions.author: Gustavo Marciano
eventsFunctionsExtensions.description:
Set the depth (Z-order) of the instance to the value of its Y position in the scene, creating an illusion of depth. The origin point of the object is used to determine the Z-order.

Useful for isometric games, 2D games with a "Top-Down" view, RPG...
eventsFunctionsExtensions.name: YSort
eventsFunctionsExtensions.shortDescription: Create an illusion of depth by setting the Z-order based on the Y position of the object. Useful for isometric games, 2D games with a "Top-Down" view, RPG...

eventsBasedBehaviors.description: Set the depth (Z-order) of the instance to the value of its Y position in the scene, creating an illusion of depth. The origin point of the object is used to determine the Z-order.
eventsBasedBehaviors.name: YSort

eventsFunctionsExtensions.author: @Lizard-13
eventsFunctionsExtensions.description:
An action which, when applied on some objects, snap these objects to a *virtual grid*, with cells having customizable width and height.

Useful for level editors or putting objects on a tiled based map (RPG, strategy games, or any tiled based game in general).
eventsFunctionsExtensions.fullName: Snap objects to a virtual grid
eventsFunctionsExtensions.name: SnapToGrid
eventsFunctionsExtensions.shortDescription: Action to snap objects to a virtual grid during the game.

eventsFunctions.description: Snap object to a virtual grid (i.e: this is not the grid used in the editor)
eventsFunctions.fullName: Snap objects to a virtual grid
eventsFunctions.name: SnapObjectToVirtualGrid
eventsFunctions.sentence: Snap _PARAM1_ to a virtual grid using cells with width: _PARAM2_px and height _PARAM3_px

events.comment: Round the Object position to snap to the in-game grid

parameters.description: Objects to to snap to the virtual grid
parameters.name: Object

parameters.description: Width of a cell of the virtual grid (in pixels)
parameters.name: CellWidth

parameters.description: Height of a cell of the virtual grid (in pixels)
parameters.name: CellHeight
